title: So what's up with Garen's Q?
body:
I just played a game as Malzahar and Ulted Garen as he was coming in for his Q, I got him in my W/E/ult combo but his Q still went off and silenced me, therefore putting my ult on CD and granting him a free kill.

Is that supposed to happen?

replies.body: Its garen, normal rules don't apply to garen, normal rules dictate that strong champions get nerfed, so he got buffed. Normal rules dictate that if you suppress someone they cant silence you, so green silenced you.
